-- | Blocked GZip
--   
@package pipes-bgzf
@version 0.2.0.1

module Pipes.Bgzf
inflateBlock :: ByteString -> ByteString
parseHeader :: ByteString -> Int
bgzfPipe :: MonadIO m => Handle -> Producer' ByteString m ()
bgzfMultiPipe :: MonadIO m => [Handle] -> Producer' [ByteString] m ()
